links.title: China's central bank slashes key lending rates, including one for the first time since April 2020
links.description: China's central bank cut its benchmark lending rates again on Thursday amid concerns about a slowing economy. They include the five-year rate for the first time since April 2020. The People's Bank of China slashed the one-year loan prime rate by 10 basis points from 3.8% to 3.7%, Reuters reported.

body: @OldFngGuy $SPY $NVDA $TWLO $AAPL China cut interest rates. Not only will markets run tomorrow, but we have monthly Open Fri. Also U.S. rate hike fears will be tempered now because they don't wanna give China more leverage/advantage. Oldfngguy is right in the U.S. can't raise too aggressively if the rest of the world doesn't follow. We'll get a cpl hikes this yr, but I bet fear will now be gone and the markets have outrun the hikes and will need to correct to the upside now, and HARD!!

body: @IToldYouSo i need some hopium, so why are you BullPosting today? I am down in the dumps, and clueless atm with ER being the only savior imo. So please share bull thesis to help me feel good $aapl

$SPY $TSLA $NVDA $MSFT $AAPL 
I’m sure many of you guys heard of doubling a penny every day for 30 days and it turns to over $5M. Well, how about starting with $5K and instead of doubling it for 30 days, just double it for 10 days?! In other words, if you start with $5K and do 10 trades with each trade giving 100% return, that is also going to be equal to over $5M. (Very possible to get 100% returns playing options). You have to compound it though. But ovbiously there is a risk to it. If you screw one trade, you can lose all. Especially if you are doing options. Better to wait for quality trades where you can be confident instead of day trading and kinda gambling. This can be achieved with trades like TSLA, split news, or AAPL split news etc. The power of compounding gains is great if you know what you doing. Download a compounding calculator app to your phone and play around with numbers. It’s pretty impressive how gains can be huge when a trade goes your way.
🐻❤ https://finviz.com/news.ashx $tsla $aapl $f $ccl $aal and more

body: $AAPL tomorrow we commence short squeeeezy attack mode.   Bears prepare to get your lube ready.

$SPY $QQQ $AMD $AAPL I was dead-on predictions last night that ran up the stock market today, Biden didn't help, but, honestly, FIRE!!!, Biden wasn't it.

It is ROR on RO

Rates & Oil 👍

Sure, some ER bugs missed or weren't as good as pumped early, cough-cough--BAC, BAC, but, by and LARGE, the big thing, guys is rates.

And. They. Are. On. Fire. 

Today, eh, not so much, that ACTUALLY brought panic to market because 10yr dropped....and markets stayed LOWer....

K? 

Getting all this, range was 1.03-1.06 2yr, 1.83-1.87 10yr, so, yeah, def. not benign but not, honestly, the driving factor.

What was? 

Oil!! 

86.13 set TONE early a.m. & fought session👍

So tomorrow, I expect rates to take over, in my anslysis--others too think same but this is my own psychology at play. 2%, big bond money WANTS 2%...

And after that HOUSING STARTS report yesterday, I think it gets it. 30 yr to 2.25% too, by Friday🔥👌

So:
 2 yr-1.07.77
10yr-2% TOMORROW

Oil $86.50 AND ....
MARKETS DONE FOR, 444 tom.
